amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Reissue Revised Statutes of Nebraska
amendatorysection.para: Whether a document of title is adequate to fulfill the obligations of a contract for sale, a contract for lease, or the conditions of a letter of credit is determined by article 2, 2A, or 5.

annotation.para: Prior Uniform Statutory Provision: Former section 7-509.
To cross-refer to the articles of this code which deal with the substantive issues of the type of document of title required under the contract entered into by the parties.
